issues.description: Text input for 'Name' is missing an associated label. Relying on placeholder text does not provide a programmatically associated label.
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label htmlFor="name">Name</label> and give the input an id (e.g., id="name"), or provide an aria-label/aria-labelledby to ensure an accessible name.

issues.description: Email input is missing an associated label. Placeholder text alone is not sufficient for assistive technologies.
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label htmlFor="email">Email address</label> and give the input an id (e.g., id="email"), or provide an aria-label/aria-labelledby to ensure an accessible name.

issues.description: Textarea for the message is missing an associated label. Placeholder text is not an accessible replacement for a label.
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label htmlFor="message">Your Message</label> and give the textarea an id (e.g., id="message"), or provide an aria-label/aria-labelledby to ensure an accessible name.

issues.description: The iframe title is not descriptive of its content/purpose, which can hinder navigation for screen reader users.
issues.recommendation: Use a descriptive title such as title="Map showing store location" or similar that clearly describes the iframe’s content.

issues.description: Image has empty alt attribute but appears to be informative content
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text describing the image (e.g., alt="Team photo at Uomo"), or confirm it is purely decorative and keep alt=""

issues.description: Image has empty alt attribute but appears to be informative content
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text describing the image (e.g., alt="Office interior of the company"), or confirm it is purely decorative and keep alt=""

issues.description: Brand logo image has empty alt text; logos typically convey the brand name and are informative
issues.recommendation: Set alt text to the brand name (e.g., alt="Brand 1") or appropriate brand name

issues.description: Brand logo image has empty alt text; logos typically convey the brand name and are informative
issues.recommendation: Set alt text to the brand name (e.g., alt="Brand 2") or appropriate brand name

issues.description: Brand logo image has empty alt text; logos typically convey the brand name and are informative
issues.recommendation: Set alt text to the brand name (e.g., alt="Brand 3") or appropriate brand name

issues.description: Brand logo image has empty alt text; logos typically convey the brand name and are informative
issues.recommendation: Set alt text to the brand name (e.g., alt="Brand 4") or appropriate brand name

issues.description: Brand logo image has empty alt text; logos typically convey the brand name and are informative
issues.recommendation: Set alt text to the brand name (e.g., alt="Brand 5") or appropriate brand name

issues.description: Brand logo image has empty alt text; logos typically convey the brand name and are informative
issues.recommendation: Set alt text to the brand name (e.g., alt="Brand 6") or appropriate brand name

issues.description: Brand logo image has empty alt text; logos typically convey the brand name and are informative
issues.recommendation: Set alt text to the brand name (e.g., alt="Brand 7") or appropriate brand name

issues.description: Autoplaying carousel moves content automatically without a visible mechanism to pause, stop, or hide the movement
issues.recommendation: Provide keyboard-accessible controls to pause/stop the carousel or disable autoplay by default (e.g., add a Pause/Play button and use Swiper's methods to control Autoplay)

issues.description: Decorative SVG icon is not hidden from assistive technologies and lacks a text alternative.
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true" to the icon. If informative, provide an accessible name via aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Fast and free delivery") and role="img".

issues.description: Decorative SVG icon is not hidden from assistive technologies and lacks a text alternative.
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true" to the icon. If informative, provide an accessible name via aria-label (e.g., aria-label="24/7 customer support") and role="img".

issues.description: Decorative SVG icon is not hidden from assistive technologies and lacks a text alternative.
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true" to the icon. If informative, provide an accessible name via aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Money-back guarantee") and role="img".

issues.description: A set of visually grouped items is presented using generic divs instead of semantic list markup, which may obscure list relationships to assistive technologies.
issues.recommendation: Use semantic list markup: change the container to a <ul> and each serviceBox to an <li>, preserving existing classes for styling.

issues.description: Heading tag used for non-heading content (numeric value).
issues.recommendation: Use semantic elements (e.g., <span> or <time>) for numeric values instead of heading tags. Example: <time aria-label='Days remaining'>{timeLeft.days}</time>.

issues.description: Heading tag used for non-heading punctuation/decoration.
issues.recommendation: Use a non-heading element such as for separators. Example: :.

issues.description: Heading tag used for non-heading content (numeric value).
issues.recommendation: Use semantic elements (e.g., <span> or <time>) for numeric values instead of heading tags. Example: <time aria-label='Hours remaining'>{timeLeft.hours}</time>.

issues.description: Heading tag used for non-heading punctuation/decoration.
issues.recommendation: Use a non-heading element such as for separators. Example: :.

issues.description: Heading tag used for non-heading content (numeric value).
issues.recommendation: Use semantic elements (e.g., <span> or <time>) for numeric values instead of heading tags. Example: <time aria-label='Minutes remaining'>{formatTime(timeLeft.minutes)}</time>.

issues.description: Heading tag used for non-heading punctuation/decoration.
issues.recommendation: Use a non-heading element such as for separators. Example: :.

issues.description: Heading tag used for non-heading content (numeric value).
issues.recommendation: Use semantic elements (e.g., <span> or <time>) for numeric values instead of heading tags. Example: <time aria-label='Seconds remaining'>{formatTime(timeLeft.seconds)}</time>.

issues.description: Auto-updating content (countdown updates every second) without a mechanism to pause, stop, or hide can be distracting.
issues.recommendation: Provide a control to pause/stop the countdown (e.g., a 'Pause timer' button that stops the interval), or allow users to hide the timer. If updates are essential, consider reducing update frequency and ensure the region is not announced repeatedly to assistive tech (e.g., avoid aria-live unless necessary).

issues.description: Links rely on color/hover state to indicate clickability; removing underline can make links indistinguishable from surrounding text.
issues.recommendation: Provide a persistent non-color visual indicator for links (e.g., keep text-decoration: underline) and ensure a visible focus style (e.g., :focus with underline or outline) so link purpose is clear without relying on color or hover.

issues.description: Informative product image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Provide a meaningful alt attribute, e.g., alt={item.productName}

issues.description: Informative product image has empty alt text (mobile view)
issues.recommendation: Provide a meaningful alt attribute, e.g., alt={item.productName}

issues.description: Empty table header cell results in unlabeled column
issues.recommendation: Provide a descriptive header text or use scope and appropriate markup to ensure each column has a label

issues.description: Empty table header cell results in unlabeled column
issues.recommendation: Provide a descriptive header text or use scope and appropriate markup to ensure each column has a label

issues.description: Clickable icon is not a focusable interactive element, not operable by keyboard
issues.recommendation: Use a button element with an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="Remove item") or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handlers

issues.description: Clickable icon is not a focusable interactive element in mobile view, not operable by keyboard
issues.recommendation: Use a button element with an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="Remove item") or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handlers

issues.lineContent:
<input
                                  type="text"
                                  min="1"
                                  max="20"
                                  value={item.quantity}
                                  onChange={(e) =>
                                    handleQuantityChange(
                                      item.productID,
                                      parseInt(e.target.value)
                                    )
                                  }
                                />
issues.description: Quantity input lacks an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label with a for/id association or an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Quantity") and consider using type="number"

issues.lineContent:
<input
                                        type="text"
                                        min="1"
                                        max="20"
                                        value={item.quantity}
                                        onChange={(e) =>
                                          handleQuantityChange(
                                            item.productID,
                                            parseInt(e.target.value)
                                          )
                                        }
                                      />
issues.description: Quantity input in mobile view lacks an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label with a for/id association or an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Quantity") and consider using type="number"

issues.description: Coupon code input relies on placeholder and lacks an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label (e.g., <label for="coupon">Coupon Code</label>) and set id on the input, or use aria-label

issues.description: Coupon code input (mobile view) relies on placeholder and lacks an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label (e.g., <label for="coupon-mobile">Coupon Code</label>) and set id on the input, or use aria-label

issues.description: Invalid table structure: <th> placed directly inside <tfoot> without a wrapping <tr>
issues.recommendation: Wrap footer cells in a inside , e.g., …

issues.description: Interactive element nesting: a <button> is placed inside a link
issues.recommendation: Use a single interactive element. Either style the <Link> as a button or move the onClick to the button and navigate programmatically

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for tab buttons
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible focus style (e.g., outline, border, or box-shadow) for :focus and :focus-visible states

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for quantity input
issues.recommendation: Add a custom focus style using :focus or :focus-visible with sufficient contrast

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for coupon input
issues.recommendation: Add visible focus styles (e.g., outline or box-shadow) for keyboard focus

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for select element
issues.recommendation: Provide visible focus styles for the select (e.g., outline or border change on :focus/:focus-visible)

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for checkbox inputs
issues.recommendation: Ensure custom checkboxes have a clear focus state using :focus-visible

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for radio inputs
issues.recommendation: Ensure custom radios have a visible focus state using :focus-visible

issues.description: Popup dialog lacks ARIA role and accessible name
issues.recommendation: Add role="dialog" and aria-modal="true" to the dialog container and provide an accessible name using aria-labelledby referencing the dialog heading or aria-label

issues.description: Close button label is not descriptive; the "×" character may not clearly convey purpose to screen reader users
issues.recommendation: Add an accessible name such as aria-label="Close" or include visually hidden text "Close" inside the button

issues.description: Form input is missing an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label> associated via for/id, or use aria-label/aria-labelledby to provide an accessible name; do not rely on placeholder as a label

issues.description: Focus indicator is removed from the input field
issues.recommendation: Avoid removing the focus outline; provide a custom visible focus style (e.g., outline or box-shadow) with sufficient contrast

issues.description: Categories are presented as paragraphs instead of a semantic list, which does not convey the list relationship
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic list (<ul><li>) for the category items, or use a group of buttons if they are interactive

issues.description: Image has a non-descriptive alt attribute
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text that describes the thumbnail, e.g., the blog post title; if purely decorative, use alt=""

issues.description: Link text 'Continue Reading' is ambiguous when listed multiple times and may not be clear out of context
issues.recommendation: Make the link purpose clear by including the post title in the link text or add an aria-label, e.g., aria-label={`Continue reading: ${blogPost.blogHeading}`}

issues.description: Blog post titles are not marked up with semantic heading elements
issues.recommendation: Use appropriate heading levels (e.g., <h3>) for post titles and place the Link inside the heading

issues.description: Clickable paragraph with onClick is not focusable or operable with keyboard
issues.recommendation: Use a native <button> element for actions, or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Control label does not accurately describe its action (it scrolls to top, not 'Show More')
issues.recommendation: Update the label to describe the action (e.g., 'Back to top') or implement actual 'show more' functionality

issues.description: Text color #767676 on a light background may not meet the 4.5:1 contrast ratio for 14px text
issues.recommendation: Increase contrast by using a darker color (e.g., #595959 or #4d4d4d), or increase font size/weight to qualify as large text

issues.description: Featured blog image has empty alt text; likely informative content without an accessible name
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text describing the image content (e.g., alt="[describe featured image]"); use alt="" only if the image is purely decorative

issues.description: Informative image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Add a descriptive alt attribute for the image; if decorative, keep alt="" and ensure it conveys no information

issues.description: Informative image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Add a descriptive alt attribute for the image; if decorative, keep alt="" and ensure it conveys no information

issues.description:
Invalid HTML nesting: a
    is placed inside a

    element, which breaks proper parsing and semantics
issues.recommendation:
Remove the

wrapper around the list. Place the

    directly in the container, or wrap both in a semantic container (e.g., a
    )

issues.description:
Invalid HTML nesting: an
    is placed inside a

    element, which breaks proper parsing and semantics
issues.recommendation:
Remove the

wrapper around the list. Place the

    directly in the container, or wrap both in a semantic container (e.g., a
    )

issues.description: Clickable action bound to a non-interactive <div> is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use a native <button> or <a> element for interactive controls, or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and handle Enter/Space key events

issues.description: Non-interactive element used as a control lacks an explicit role and accessible name
issues.recommendation: Replace the <div> with a <button> that includes an accessible name (the visible text is sufficient), or add role="button" and ensure it can be programmatically determined and operated

issues.description: Clickable action bound to a non-interactive <div> is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use a native <button> or <a> element for interactive controls, or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and handle Enter/Space key events

issues.description: Non-interactive element used as a control lacks an explicit role and accessible name
issues.recommendation: Replace the <div> with a <button> that includes an accessible name (the visible text is sufficient), or add role="button" and ensure it can be programmatically determined and operated

issues.description: Icon-only button has no accessible name, so its purpose is not announced to assistive technologies
issues.recommendation: Add a clear accessible name via visible text or aria-label (e.g., aria-label="More share options")

issues.description: Insufficient color contrast for Twitter share button text (white on #1da1f2 likely below 4.5:1 for 16px text)
issues.recommendation: Increase contrast by darkening the background color or using a darker text color to achieve at least a 4.5:1 ratio (or increase text size/weight to qualify as large text with a 3:1 ratio)

issues.description: Meaningful product image has empty alt attribute
issues.recommendation: Provide descriptive alt text for the product image (e.g., alt={product.productName})

issues.description: Meaningful product image (back view) has empty alt attribute
issues.recommendation: Provide descriptive alt text for the product image (e.g., alt={`Back view of ${product.productName}`})

issues.description: Link contains only images with empty alt, resulting in no accessible name
issues.recommendation: Ensure images inside the link have meaningful alt text or add aria-label to the link describing its destination

issues.description: Clickable div is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use a <button> element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handlers

issues.description: Clickable div is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use a <button> element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handlers

issues.description: Clickable heading used as a button is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic <button> with onClick or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers

issues.description: Custom clickable control lacks accessible name and role
issues.recommendation: Use a <button aria-label="Add to cart"> or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and aria-label

issues.description: Clickable icon is not focusable or operable via keyboard
issues.recommendation: Wrap in a button or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers; provide an accessible label

issues.description: Wishlist state is conveyed only by color
issues.recommendation: Provide a non-color indicator (e.g., aria-pressed state, tooltip, or text) and ensure accessible name reflects state

issues.description: Clickable pagination control is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use <button> or <a href> for pagination controls or add role, tabIndex, and keyboard handlers

issues.description: Clickable pagination number is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use <button> or <a href> with proper semantics and keyboard support

issues.description: Clickable pagination control is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use <button> or <a href> for pagination controls or add role, tabIndex, and keyboard handlers

issues.description: Form control is missing an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label for="sort"> or an aria-label/aria-labelledby for the select control

issues.description: Custom close control lacks role and accessible name and is not focusable
issues.recommendation: Use a <button aria-label="Close filter"> or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and aria-label with keyboard support

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from select control without providing an alternative
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible custom focus style (e.g., outline or box-shadow) for keyboard focus on the select

issues.description: Duplicate id value used on multiple AccordionSummary elements
issues.recommendation: Ensure each AccordionSummary has a unique id (e.g., id="categories-header", id="colors-header")

issues.description: aria-controls references a non-existent element id
issues.recommendation: Provide a matching id on the controlled AccordionDetails element or remove aria-controls; ensure the reference is unique and valid

issues.description: Duplicate id value used on multiple AccordionSummary elements
issues.recommendation: Ensure each AccordionSummary has a unique id (e.g., id="colors-header")

issues.description: aria-controls references a non-existent element id
issues.recommendation: Provide a matching id on the controlled AccordionDetails element or remove aria-controls; ensure the reference is unique and valid

issues.description: Duplicate id value used on multiple AccordionSummary elements
issues.recommendation: Ensure each AccordionSummary has a unique id (e.g., id="sizes-header")

issues.description: aria-controls references a non-existent element id
issues.recommendation: Provide a matching id on the controlled AccordionDetails element or remove aria-controls; ensure the reference is unique and valid

issues.description: Duplicate id value used on multiple AccordionSummary elements
issues.recommendation: Ensure each AccordionSummary has a unique id (e.g., id="brands-header")

issues.description: aria-controls references a non-existent element id
issues.recommendation: Provide a matching id on the controlled AccordionDetails element or remove aria-controls; ensure the reference is unique and valid

issues.description: Duplicate id value used on multiple AccordionSummary elements
issues.recommendation: Ensure each AccordionSummary has a unique id (e.g., id="price-header")

issues.description: aria-controls references a non-existent element id
issues.recommendation: Provide a matching id on the controlled AccordionDetails element or remove aria-controls; ensure the reference is unique and valid

issues.description: Button has no accessible name (no text or aria-label)
issues.recommendation: Provide an accessible name via aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Navy blue") or include hidden text that describes the color

issues.description: Toggle button does not expose its pressed/selected state to assistive technologies
issues.recommendation: Use aria-pressed to indicate selection state (e.g., aria-pressed={selectedColors.includes(color)}) or use role="checkbox" with aria-checked

issues.description: Toggle button does not expose its pressed/selected state to assistive technologies
issues.recommendation: Use aria-pressed to indicate selection state (e.g., aria-pressed={selectedSizes.includes(size)}) or use role="checkbox" with aria-checked

issues.description: Text input is missing an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label for> or an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Search brands") or aria-labelledby to describe the input

issues.description: Decorative search icon is not hidden from assistive technologies
issues.recommendation: Mark the icon as decorative with aria-hidden="true" or provide an appropriate accessible name if it conveys information

issues.description: Slider label is not descriptive for its purpose (price filter)
issues.recommendation: Use a descriptive label such as getAriaLabel={() => "Price range"} and consider differentiating thumbs (e.g., aria-labels "Minimum price" and "Maximum price")

issues.description: List of categories is not marked up semantically as a list
issues.recommendation: Use semantic list markup (e.g., <ul> with <li> items) for category lists to convey structure to assistive technologies

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for color buttons without providing a visible custom focus style
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible :focus or :focus-visible style (e.g., outline or box-shadow) to clearly indicate keyboard focus

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for size buttons without providing a visible custom focus style
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible :focus or :focus-visible style (e.g., outline or box-shadow) to clearly indicate keyboard focus

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for search input without providing a visible custom focus style
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible :focus or :focus-visible style (e.g., outline or border change with sufficient contrast) to clearly indicate keyboard focus

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for custom checkbox without providing a visible custom focus style
issues.recommendation: Add a :focus-visible style (e.g., thicker outline or box-shadow) to the .brandRadio control to indicate keyboard focus

issues.description: Text color likely fails contrast against white background (pure red ~4.0:1 at normal text size)
issues.recommendation: Use a darker red with at least 4.5:1 contrast against white (e.g., #B30000) or increase text size/weight to meet contrast requirements

issues.description: Clickable div is not keyboard accessible (non-interactive element with onClick)
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic <button> element for the control, or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handlers (e.g., Enter and Space) to ensure full keyboard accessibility.

issues.description: Custom control lacks an accessible name and role for assistive technologies
issues.recommendation: Replace the div with <button type="button" className="iconStyle" aria-label="Scroll to top"> or add role="button" and aria-label="Scroll to top" to the element so screen readers can identify and announce it.

issues.description:
onClick used on non-interactive

element (tab) makes it inaccessible to keyboard users
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic <button> for the tab or add role="tab", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Custom tab control lacks appropriate role and state (no role="tab" and aria-selected)
issues.recommendation: Implement tabs with role="tab" on each tab, aria-selected to reflect state, and associate with panels via aria-controls

issues.description:
onClick used on non-interactive

element (tab) makes it inaccessible to keyboard users
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic <button> for the tab or add role="tab", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Custom tab control lacks appropriate role and state (no role="tab" and aria-selected)
issues.recommendation: Implement tabs with role="tab" on each tab, aria-selected to reflect state, and associate with panels via aria-controls

issues.description: onClick used on non-interactive <span> makes it inaccessible to keyboard users
issues.recommendation: Use a <button> element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Custom control lacks appropriate role and name (no role="button" or aria attributes)
issues.recommendation: Use a native <button> or add role="button" and ensure an accessible name; include keyboard support for Enter/Space

issues.description: Input field is missing an associated <label>
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label associated via htmlFor/id (e.g., <label htmlFor="login-email">Email address *</label><input id="login-email" ... />)

issues.description: Input field is missing an associated <label>
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label associated via htmlFor/id (e.g., <label htmlFor="login-password">Password *</label><input id="login-password" ... />)

issues.description: Input field is missing an associated <label>
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label associated via htmlFor/id (e.g., <label htmlFor="reg-username">Username *</label><input id="reg-username" ... />)

issues.description: Input field is missing an associated <label>
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label associated via htmlFor/id (e.g., <label htmlFor="reg-email">Email address *</label><input id="reg-email" ... />)

issues.description: Input field is missing an associated <label>
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label associated via htmlFor/id (e.g., <label htmlFor="reg-password">Password *</label><input id="reg-password" ... />)

issues.description: Tab container lacks appropriate role to convey relationships
issues.recommendation: Add role="tablist" to the tab container and ensure tabs have role="tab" and panels have role="tabpanel"

issues.description: Tab panel lacks appropriate role and association with its tab
issues.recommendation: Add role="tabpanel" and id on the panel, and reference it from the controlling tab with aria-controls; also use aria-labelledby on the panel

issues.description: Tab panel lacks appropriate role and association with its tab
issues.recommendation: Add role="tabpanel" and id on the panel, and reference it from the controlling tab with aria-controls; also use aria-labelledby on the panel

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from custom checkbox without providing an alternative focus style
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible focus style using :focus or :focus-visible (e.g., outline: 2px solid #000 or a clear box-shadow) instead of removing the outline

issues.description: Insufficient text contrast for tab labels (#767676 on white is about 4.1:1; requires at least 4.5:1 for normal text)
issues.recommendation: Use a darker color to reach at least 4.5:1 contrast (e.g., #595959 or #333333)

issues.description: Insufficient text contrast for "Remember me" text (#767676 on white is about 4.1:1; requires at least 4.5:1 for normal text)
issues.recommendation: Use a darker color to reach at least 4.5:1 contrast (e.g., #595959 or #333333)

issues.description: Insufficient text contrast for helper text under login form (#767676 on white is about 4.1:1; requires at least 4.5:1 for normal text)
issues.recommendation: Use a darker color to reach at least 4.5:1 contrast (e.g., #595959 or #333333)

issues.description: Insufficient text contrast for helper text under register form (#767676 on white is about 4.1:1; requires at least 4.5:1 for normal text)
issues.recommendation: Use a darker color to reach at least 4.5:1 contrast (e.g., #595959 or #333333)

issues.description: Form input is missing an explicit, associated label; placeholder is used as the only label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible label associated with the input via htmlFor/id (e.g., <label htmlFor="email">Email address</label> and id="email" on the input); do not rely solely on placeholder text for labeling

issues.description: Paragraph text color (#767676) at 14px likely fails the minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio against a white background
issues.recommendation: Use a darker text color (e.g., #595959 or darker) or increase text size/weight to ensure at least 4.5:1 contrast for normal text

issues.description: Paragraph text color (#767676) at 14px likely fails the minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio against a white background
issues.recommendation: Use a darker text color (e.g., #595959 or darker) or increase text size/weight to ensure at least 4.5:1 contrast for normal text

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for interactive SVG control, making keyboard focus not visible
issues.recommendation: Do not remove outlines without providing a visible custom focus style. Add a clear focus indicator using :focus and :focus-visible (e.g., outline or box-shadow) for .swiper-button svg

issues.description: Focus indicator removed for interactive SVG control at small viewport, making keyboard focus not visible
issues.recommendation: Do not remove outlines without providing a visible custom focus style. Add a clear focus indicator using :focus and :focus-visible (e.g., outline or box-shadow) for .swiper-button svg in this media query

issues.description: Clickable icon is not keyboard accessible (non-interactive SVG with onClick handler)
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic <button> with an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="Search") or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Link has no accessible name (icon-only)
issues.recommendation: Add visible text or an aria-label describing the destination (e.g., aria-label="My Account"); alternatively include visually hidden text

issues.description: Link has no accessible name (icon-only)
issues.recommendation: Add an accessible name such as aria-label="Cart" and consider including the item count (e.g., aria-label="Cart, 3 items") or include visually hidden text

issues.description: Clickable icon is not keyboard accessible (non-interactive SVG with onClick handler)
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic <button> with an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="Wishlist") or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Mobile menu toggle is not keyboard accessible (icon with onClick only)
issues.recommendation: Replace with a <button> element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Mobile menu toggle lacks accessible name/role and state (aria-expanded, aria-controls)
issues.recommendation: Use a <button aria-label="Close menu" aria-expanded={mobileMenuOpen} aria-controls="mobile-menu"> to convey role and state programmatically

issues.description: Mobile menu toggle is not keyboard accessible (icon with onClick only)
issues.recommendation: Replace with a <button> element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers for Enter/Space

issues.description: Mobile menu toggle lacks accessible name/role and state (aria-expanded, aria-controls)
issues.recommendation: Use a <button aria-label="Open menu" aria-expanded={mobileMenuOpen} aria-controls="mobile-menu"> to convey role and state programmatically

issues.description: Link has no accessible name (icon-only)
issues.recommendation: Add an accessible name such as aria-label="Cart" (optionally include item count) or include visually hidden text

issues.description: Input field is missing an associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a <label htmlFor> bound to the input’s id (e.g., label "Search products") or use aria-label/aria-labelledby

issues.description: Link has no accessible name (icon-only)
issues.recommendation: Add an aria-label describing the action (e.g., aria-label="Search") or include visually hidden text

issues.description: Select field is missing a programmatically associated label
issues.recommendation: Add <label htmlFor="language">Language</label> or use aria-label/aria-labelledby for the select

issues.description: Select field is missing a programmatically associated label
issues.recommendation: Add <label htmlFor="currency">Currency</label> or use aria-label/aria-labelledby for the select

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from input field
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible focus style (e.g., outline or box-shadow) rather than removing the outline

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from select field (Language)
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible focus style for the select (e.g., outline or box-shadow) rather than removing the outline

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from select field (Currency)
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible focus style for the select (e.g., outline or box-shadow) rather than removing the outline

issues.description: Heading level skips from h1 to h3, creating an improper hierarchy
issues.recommendation: Use sequential heading levels; change h3 to h2 or make 'Page not found' the h1 and adjust other headings accordingly

issues.description: Top-level heading is not descriptive of the page content
issues.recommendation: Use a descriptive h1 such as 'Page not found' and move 'OOPS!' to supporting text or remove it

issues.description: Link text 'Go Back' may be ambiguous when taken out of context
issues.recommendation: Use clearer link text like 'Go to Home page' or add an aria-label that specifies the destination

issues.description: Text is placed directly over a background image, which can reduce contrast and readability
issues.recommendation: Ensure text maintains at least 4.5:1 contrast by adding a solid background or semi-opaque overlay behind text, adjusting text color, or avoiding text over images

issues.description: Page component does not set a descriptive document title
issues.recommendation: Set a specific page title (e.g., using document.title or a head manager like react-helmet) such as '404 – Page not found'

issues.description: Canvas-based 3D content lacks a text alternative or accessible name
issues.recommendation: If the 3D model conveys information, add role="img" with an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="3D rotating T‑shirt model") or provide fallback text; if decorative, set aria-hidden="true"

issues.description: 3D model interaction (rotation) is only operable via pointer and lacks a keyboard alternative
issues.recommendation: Provide keyboard-accessible controls (e.g., arrow keys or buttons to rotate/pause) or ensure equivalent non-pointer operation; if interaction is non-essential, disable it or mark content as decorative

issues.description: Auto-rotating content runs continuously without a mechanism to pause, stop, or hide
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible control to pause/stop the rotation and honor prefers-reduced-motion by reducing or disabling animation for users who request it

issues.description: Button has no accessible name (empty content)
issues.recommendation: Add a text label or an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Select dark gray color") and consider adding visible text or a visually hidden label for clarity

issues.description: Button has no accessible name (empty content)
issues.recommendation: Add a text label or an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Select gold color") and consider adding visible text or a visually hidden label for clarity

issues.description: Button has no accessible name (empty content)
issues.recommendation: Add a text label or an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Select purple color") and consider adding visible text or a visually hidden label for clarity

issues.description: Button has no accessible name (empty content)
issues.recommendation: Add a text label or an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Select red color") and consider adding visible text or a visually hidden label for clarity

issues.description: Color options are conveyed solely by color without additional text or non-color indicators
issues.recommendation: Add visible text labels (e.g., ‘Red’, ‘Purple’) or non-color cues (patterns, icons) to identify options; ensure programmatic labels via aria-label are present for screen readers

issues.description: Link text 'Discover More' may not clearly describe the destination out of context
issues.recommendation: Make the link text more descriptive (e.g., 'Shop Summer Sale') or add an aria-label to the Link that clarifies the destination

issues.description:
Tab control implemented with a non-interactive

and click handler only; not operable via keyboard
issues.recommendation: Use a <button> for tabs or add role="tab", tabIndex="0", and handle Enter/Space keys to activate; ensure focus is managed

issues.description:
Tab control implemented with a non-interactive

and click handler only; not operable via keyboard
issues.recommendation: Use a <button> for tabs or add role="tab", tabIndex="0", and handle Enter/Space keys to activate; ensure focus is managed

issues.description:
Tab control implemented with a non-interactive

and click handler only; not operable via keyboard
issues.recommendation: Use a <button> for tabs or add role="tab", tabIndex="0", and handle Enter/Space keys to activate; ensure focus is managed

issues.description: Custom tab control lacks semantic roles and accessible state
issues.recommendation: Apply proper tab semantics: role="tablist" to the container, role="tab" to each tab, aria-selected for active state, and aria-controls linking to the panel; alternatively use native <button> elements

issues.description:
Invalid HTML:
    nested inside a

    element
issues.recommendation:
Do not wrap list elements in

; move the

    outside of the

    and use proper semantic structure

issues.description:
Invalid HTML:
    nested inside a

    element
issues.recommendation:
Do not wrap list elements in

; move the

    outside of the

    and use proper semantic structure

issues.description: Image has empty alt text; likely conveys user identity
issues.recommendation: Provide descriptive alt text (e.g., alt="Photo of Janice Miller") or confirm decorative intent and use alt="" with aria-hidden="true"

issues.description: Image has empty alt text; likely conveys user identity
issues.recommendation: Provide descriptive alt text (e.g., alt="Photo of Benjam Porter") or confirm decorative intent and use alt="" with aria-hidden="true"

issues.description: Star icons convey rating without an accessible text alternative
issues.recommendation: Provide an accessible label for the rating (e.g., aria-label="Rated 5 out of 5") on the container and set decorative icons to aria-hidden="true"

issues.description: Label is not programmatically associated with the Rating component
issues.recommendation: Associate the label using htmlFor with a matching id, or set aria-labelledby on the Rating; with MUI Rating, use getLabelText/aria-label to ensure an accessible name

issues.description: Textarea lacks an associated label; placeholder is not a sufficient accessible name
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label> linked via htmlFor/id or provide aria-label/aria-labelledby

issues.description: Text input for name lacks an associated label; placeholder is not a sufficient accessible name
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label> linked via htmlFor/id or provide aria-label/aria-labelledby

issues.description: Email input lacks an associated label; placeholder is not a sufficient accessible name
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label> linked via htmlFor/id or provide aria-label/aria-labelledby

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from custom checkbox without providing an accessible replacement
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible focus style (e.g., outline or box-shadow) for :focus to ensure keyboard users can see focus

issues.description: Interactive image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text describing the thumbnail (e.g., 'Thumbnail: Lightweight Puffer Jacket view 1') or convert to a button with an accessible name

issues.description: Clickable image is not keyboard accessible (no role or tabIndex)
issues.recommendation: Use a button element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers (Enter/Space) to activate; include an accessible name

issues.description: Interactive image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text describing the thumbnail or convert to a button with an accessible name

issues.description: Clickable image is not keyboard accessible (no role or tabIndex)
issues.recommendation: Use a button element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers (Enter/Space) to activate; include an accessible name

issues.description: Interactive image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text describing the thumbnail or convert to a button with an accessible name

issues.description: Clickable image is not keyboard accessible (no role or tabIndex)
issues.recommendation: Use a button element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers (Enter/Space) to activate; include an accessible name

issues.description: Interactive image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text describing the thumbnail or convert to a button with an accessible name

issues.description: Clickable image is not keyboard accessible (no role or tabIndex)
issues.recommendation: Use a button element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers (Enter/Space) to activate; include an accessible name

issues.description: Informative product image has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Add alt text describing the current product image (e.g., 'Lightweight Puffer Jacket, front view')

issues.description: Custom control lacks an accessible name (icon-only button)
issues.recommendation: Add aria-label such as aria-label="Previous image" and ensure the icon is aria-hidden

issues.description: Custom control lacks an accessible name (icon-only button)
issues.recommendation: Add aria-label such as aria-label="Next image" and ensure the icon is aria-hidden

issues.description: Rating conveyed via non-text icons without accessible text
issues.recommendation: Provide accessible text like 'Rated 5 out of 5' via aria-label on the container and mark decorative star icons as aria-hidden="true"

issues.description: Color selection button has no accessible name
issues.recommendation: Add an aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Select color Black") and use a radio group pattern with role="radiogroup" on the group and role="radio" with aria-checked on each option

issues.description: Input field missing associated label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label> associated via htmlFor/for or provide aria-label/aria-labelledby (e.g., label 'Quantity')

issues.description: Button label is not descriptive ('-')
issues.recommendation: Add an aria-label like aria-label="Decrease quantity" or include visually hidden descriptive text

issues.description: Button label is not descriptive ('+')
issues.recommendation: Add an aria-label like aria-label="Increase quantity" or include visually hidden descriptive text

issues.description: Link text 'Prev' does not clearly indicate purpose or destination
issues.recommendation: Provide more descriptive link text (e.g., 'Previous product') or include aria-label for screen readers

issues.description: Link text 'Next' does not clearly indicate purpose or destination
issues.recommendation: Provide more descriptive link text (e.g., 'Next product') or include aria-label for screen readers

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from navigation button without a replacement
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible custom focus style (e.g., focus outline or box-shadow) for .directionBtn

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from size option buttons without a replacement
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible custom focus style (e.g., :focus state with outline or box-shadow) for .sizeBtn button

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from color option buttons without a replacement
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible custom focus style (e.g., :focus state with outline or box-shadow) for .colorBtn button

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from quantity input without a replacement
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible custom focus style for .productQuantity input (e.g., border change or outline on :focus)

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from wishlist button without a replacement
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible custom focus style for .productWishList button

issues.description: Navigation control is not keyboard accessible (non-interactive element used as a button)
issues.recommendation: Use a button element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers; ensure it has an accessible name

issues.description: Custom navigation control lacks an accessible name
issues.recommendation: Add aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Next slide") or include descriptive text

issues.description: Navigation control is not keyboard accessible (non-interactive element used as a button)
issues.recommendation: Use a button element or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard handlers; ensure it has an accessible name

issues.description: Custom navigation control lacks an accessible name
issues.recommendation: Add aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Previous slide") or include descriptive text

issues.description: Clickable container is not keyboard accessible (non-interactive element used as a control)
issues.recommendation: Use a link (e.g., <Link>) or a button element; add role, tabIndex and keyboard handlers, and provide an accessible name

issues.description: Heading used as a clickable control is not keyboard accessible
issues.recommendation: Use a semantic link (<Link>) to the product or a button with keyboard support and an accessible name

issues.description: Icon used as a control lacks role and accessible name
issues.recommendation: Wrap in a button with aria-label (e.g., aria-label="Add to wishlist") and manage state with aria-pressed

issues.description: Wishlist state indicated by color alone (red vs grey)
issues.recommendation: Provide a non-color indicator (e.g., text label change, aria-pressed state, or icon fill change with accompanying text) so state is not conveyed by color alone

issues.description: Rating conveyed via non-text icons without accessible text
issues.recommendation: Provide accessible text like 'Rated 5 out of 5' via aria-label on the container and mark decorative star icons as aria-hidden="true"

issues.description: Non-decorative image (site logo) has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Provide meaningful alt text (e.g., alt="Uomo logo") or only use empty alt if the image is purely decorative

issues.description: Image conveying information about accepted payment methods has empty alt text
issues.recommendation: Add descriptive alt text (e.g., "Accepted payment methods: Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, ...") or mark as decorative only if redundant

issues.description: Standalone SVG icon lacks accessible name and is not marked as decorative
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true"; if interactive, wrap in a link/button and provide an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="Facebook")

issues.description: Standalone SVG icon lacks accessible name and is not marked as decorative
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true"; if interactive, wrap in a link/button and provide an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="X/Twitter")

issues.description: Standalone SVG icon lacks accessible name and is not marked as decorative
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true"; if interactive, wrap in a link/button and provide an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="Instagram")

issues.description: Standalone SVG icon lacks accessible name and is not marked as decorative
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true"; if interactive, wrap in a link/button and provide an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="YouTube")

issues.description: Standalone SVG icon lacks accessible name and is not marked as decorative
issues.recommendation: If decorative, add aria-hidden="true"; if interactive, wrap in a link/button and provide an accessible name (e.g., aria-label="Pinterest")

issues.description: Form input is missing an associated label; placeholder text is not a sufficient label
issues.recommendation: Add a visible <label htmlFor> and matching id on the input or use aria-label/aria-labelledby to provide an accessible name

issues.description: Select element is not programmatically associated with a label
issues.recommendation:
Add a associated to the select instead of using a

as a visual label

issues.description: Select element is not programmatically associated with a label
issues.recommendation:
Add a associated to the select instead of using a

as a visual label

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from input, reducing keyboard focus visibility
issues.recommendation: Provide a visible custom focus style (e.g., outline or box-shadow) instead of removing it (e.g., outline: 2px solid #000 or similar with sufficient contrast)

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from language select, reducing keyboard focus visibility
issues.recommendation: Restore a visible focus indicator for the select (e.g., outline or box-shadow with sufficient contrast)

issues.description: Focus indicator removed from currency select, reducing keyboard focus visibility
issues.recommendation: Restore a visible focus indicator for the select (e.g., outline or box-shadow with sufficient contrast)

issues.description: Invalid/unknown attribute "Z" may cause parsing or compatibility issues
issues.recommendation: Remove the stray attribute "Z" from the img element

issues.description: Click handler attached to a non-interactive element without an accessible role or keyboard support
issues.recommendation: Avoid placing onClick on non-interactive elements; move the handler to interactive children or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handling if needed

issues.description: Click handler attached to a non-interactive element without an accessible role or keyboard support
issues.recommendation: Avoid placing onClick on non-interactive elements; move the handler to interactive children or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handling if needed

issues.description: Click handler attached to a non-interactive element without an accessible role or keyboard support
issues.recommendation: Avoid placing onClick on non-interactive elements; move the handler to interactive children or add role="button", tabIndex="0", and keyboard event handling if needed

issues.description: Link text "Shop Now" is not descriptive enough to convey purpose when taken out of context (e.g., in a links list).
issues.recommendation: Use more descriptive link text or an aria-label, e.g., "Shop women's T‑shirts" for the left banner and "Shop men's sportswear" for the right banner.

issues.description: Link text "Shop Now" is not descriptive enough to convey purpose when taken out of context (e.g., in a links list).
issues.recommendation: Use more descriptive link text or an aria-label, e.g., "Shop men's sportswear" for this banner.

issues.description: Text is placed directly over a background image without an overlay, risking insufficient color contrast (e.g., white text over light areas).
issues.recommendation: Provide a semi-opaque overlay or solid background behind the text, or adjust colors to ensure a minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio in all states.

issues.description: Text is placed directly over a background image without an overlay, risking insufficient color contrast (e.g., black text over dark areas).
issues.recommendation: Provide a semi-opaque overlay or solid background behind the text, or adjust colors to ensure a minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio in all states.

issues.description: Fixed height on a container with text can cause clipping or overlap when users increase text size up to 200%.
issues.recommendation: Avoid fixed heights for text containers. Use min-height or allow height to auto-expand and test at 200% zoom.

issues.description: Fixed height on a container with text can cause clipping or overlap when users increase text size up to 200% at narrower viewports.
issues.recommendation: Avoid fixed heights for text containers at all breakpoints. Use responsive min-height or content-driven sizing.

issues.description: Fixed height on a container with text can cause clipping or overlap when users increase text size up to 200% on small screens.
issues.recommendation: Remove fixed heights in favor of auto or min-height and allow content to reflow naturally.

issues.description: Hover styles are defined for the link underline, but no corresponding focus styles are provided, which may make keyboard focus less apparent.
issues.recommendation: Add :focus and/or :focus-visible styles (e.g., underline or outline with sufficient contrast) to make keyboard focus clearly visible.

issues.description: Links are not visually distinguished from surrounding text, relying on color/hover only.
issues.recommendation: Restore a non-color cue for links (e.g., underline) in the default state and ensure a clear focus style.

issues.description: Link text is not descriptive on its own, making purpose unclear when taken out of context.
issues.recommendation: Make the link text unique and descriptive (e.g., "Shop Women Collection") or add an aria-label to include the context.

issues.description: Link text is not descriptive on its own, making purpose unclear when taken out of context.
issues.recommendation: Make the link text unique and descriptive (e.g., "Shop Men Collection") or add an aria-label to include the context.

issues.description: Link text is not descriptive on its own, making purpose unclear when taken out of context.
issues.recommendation: Make the link text unique and descriptive (e.g., "Shop Kids Collection") or add an aria-label to include the context.

issues.description: Link text is not descriptive on its own, making purpose unclear when taken out of context.
issues.recommendation: Make the link text unique and descriptive (e.g., "Shop E‑gift Cards") or add an aria-label to include the context.

issues.description: Heading element used for non-structural/link text, which misrepresents document structure.
issues.recommendation: Use a non-heading element (e.g., span) and apply CSS for styling, keeping headings for actual section titles.

issues.recommendation: Use a non-heading element (e.g., span) and apply CSS for styling, keeping headings for actual section titles.

issues.description: Hover-only visual feedback is provided for tiles without a corresponding focus style, which can leave keyboard users without a visible focus indicator if these tiles are interactive.
issues.recommendation: Add a :focus or :focus-visible style matching the hover effect (e.g., .instagramtile:focus-visible { opacity: 0.4; }) to ensure keyboard users have a clear focus indicator.

issues.description: Main content is not contained within a landmark region
issues.recommendation: Wrap the primary page content in a <main> element (e.g., <main className="termsContainer">) or add role="main" to convey structure to assistive technologies

issues.description: Primary page heading is not marked up as an <h1>
issues.recommendation: Use <h1> for the main page title to reflect the correct heading hierarchy

issues.lineContent: Your use of this is governed by these terms of use
issues.description: Improper heading hierarchy: using <h6> for a subsection immediately under the main heading
issues.recommendation: Use appropriate heading levels in sequence (e.g., <h2>/<h3>) to maintain a logical structure
